title: Calories in In-N-Out Hamburger
meta_description: Discover calories in n out hamburger, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for cheese or animal style.
assumptions: Standard single patty hamburger with bun, beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and signature spread; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and exact ingredients; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for updates.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out hamburger has 390 kcal, 16 g protein, and 730 mg sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, mustard, grilled onions)

faqs.q: How many calories in n out hamburger?
faqs.a: A standard In-N-Out hamburger has 390 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros for In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: 16 g protein, 19 g fat, 39 g carbs per hamburger.
About 480 calories for the cheeseburger variation.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in In-N-Out items?
faqs.a: Yes, one hamburger has 730 mg sodium from the spread and bun.

faqs.q: How does animal style affect calories in n out?
faqs.a: It adds about 190 calories due to extra toppings and grilled elements.
